features:
• Allow to configure PHPDoc reference/type and variable/params highlighting
  • Show memory column for Xdebug > 2.6
  • Auto insert <?php only in an empty file or allow to disable the option
  • Fixed: Format Code incorrectly changes list to array destructure

Many other features and changes from the IntelliJ platform and web are also included.
See blog and release notes for more details.
